nodes.description: 索马里和非洲联盟部队重新控制被袭击的联合国化合物
nodes.support_text: Somali and African Union forces have regained control of a UN compound in the Somali capital, Mogadishu, after it was attacked by gunmen...

nodes.description: 袭击始于周三上午11:30（08:30 GMT）的爆炸
nodes.support_text: A plume of thick black smoke was seen billowing into the sky after the initial explosion was heard at approximately 11:30am local time...

nodes.description: 交火持续一个半小时，包括武装分子进入化合物
nodes.support_text: The gun battle lasted an hour-and-a-half that followed an explosion at the site killing at least four foreign security staff...

nodes.description: 索马里政府确认伤亡：4名外国安保、4名索马里守卫、7名激进分子
nodes.support_text: So far we have confirmed four UNDP foreign staff who were responsible for security, four Somali guards and seven militants.

nodes.description: al-Shabab宣称对袭击负责
nodes.support_text: The al-Shabab armed group claimed responsibility for the attack.

nodes.description: 联合国秘书长表示震惊，并持续更新信息
nodes.support_text: The Secretary-General is aware of the attack against the United Nations in Somalia, and he is shocked by it...

nodes.description: 联合国官员透露袭击发生在机场化合物外（含住宅和办公区）
nodes.support_text: the attack was against a building just outside the secure airport compound where all the UN agencies were based.

nodes.description: UN员工躲进掩体，多数人员安全
nodes.support_text: UN staff took shelter in a bunker at the compound, UN staff told Al Jazeera.

nodes.description: Nicholas Kay确认袭击为复杂攻击，始于爆炸和武装分子入侵
nodes.support_text: a complex attack had taken place at the compound, but that 'the vast majority of UN staff' were safe.

nodes.description: 政府电台报道自杀式炸弹袭击在化合物入口处发生
nodes.support_text: the attack had started after a suicide bomber blew himself up at one of the gates of the complex.

nodes.description: 摩加迪沙近期安全形势回顾：多次袭击但相对平静
nodes.support_text: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon visited Mogadishu last December and announced that the UN would re-open its offices in the seaside capital.

nodes.description: 联合国重新开放办公室，加速从内罗毕转移人员
nodes.support_text: The UN began the process of moving its personnel from nearby Nairobi, Kenya, back to Mogadishu...

nodes.description: 非盟部队与政府军击退al-Shabab
nodes.support_text: The 17,000-strong AU force, fighting alongside Somali government troops, has forced al-Shabab from a series of key towns.

nodes.description: 索马里总理谴责袭击，强调联合国的重要性
nodes.support_text: Abdi Farah Shirdon, the Somali prime minister, condemned the 'senseless and despicable' attack on Wednesday...

nodes.description: 爆炸后发生交火
nodes.support_text: 爆炸后发生交火

nodes.description: 索马里政府向记者声明
nodes.support_text: 索马里政府向记者声明

nodes.description: 联合国工作人员向半岛电视台报道

nodes.description: 联合国驻索马里 compound 内部遭受袭击事件
nodes.support_text: 袭击事件发生在联合国驻索马里 compound 内部

nodes.description: 武装分子尝试攻击联合国工作人员

nodes.description: 武装分子袭击联合国工作人员

nodes.description: Al-Shabab战士控制海滨首都
nodes.support_text: Al-Shabab fighters once controlled the seaside capital.

nodes.description: 海滨首都放弃固定位置
nodes.support_text: The seaside capital abandoned fixed positions.

nodes.description: 国际使团跟进联合国行动
nodes.support_text: International embassies followed the UN's actions.

nodes.description: 周三的袭击突显了脆弱的安全局势
nodes.support_text: Wednesday’s attack highlighted the fragile security situation

nodes.description: 联合国和使馆审查安全计划
nodes.support_text: UN and embassies reviewed safety plans

nodes.description: 联合国和使馆决定是否足够防御
nodes.support_text: UN and embassies decided if defences were sufficient
